Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Param.Name: sURL
Param.Description: URL will be open

Param.Name: sVerifyTitle
Param.Description: Title need to verify, null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to AP outsource web page

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Keyword.Name: BankExportSetup
Keyword.Description: Configuration for Bank Export (Images\AdminDev\Customer_Management\7.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to configure

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name need to configure

Param.Name: sPGPEncrypt
Param.Description: Check ON/OFF for ACH or POS encrypt checkbox

Param.Name: sPGPFile
Param.Description: path of PGP Public Key file

Param.Name: sExportSetting
Param.Description: use correct keyword format: Auto|Manual or Schedule(hh;mm;TimeZone;ON/OFF)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2
Param.Description: will do export on ACH or POS tab? not null if ExportLevel1 NOT True

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Keyword.Name: CopyAllFileToFolder
Keyword.Description: Copy all file to destination folder in sequence (eg.: for ACOM Uploading)

Param.Name: sSrcFolder
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sDestFolder
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sDelay
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Param.Name: sVar1
Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Name: sVar2
Param.Description: Variable 2

Param.Name: sVar3
Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Name: sVar4
Param.Description: Variable 4

Param.Name: sVar5
Param.Description: Variable 5

Param.Name: sVar6
Param.Description: Variable 6

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Param.Name: sDate
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sNumOfDays
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sWorkingDate
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: ExportFileOnBankExports
Keyword.Description: Click an Export button on Bank Exports tab (Images\Customer\Payment\77.png)

Param.Name: sViewList
Param.Description: select a view list: Ready for Export, Exported, Error

Param.Name: sExportLevel1
Param.Description: will Click Export All button?

Param.Name: sExportLevel2

Param.Name: sExportLevel3
Param.Description: what item to click export? base on tab was provided from ExportLevel2

Param.Name: sACHExportOption
Param.Description: call to ACHExportEffectiveDateOption keyword, use correct format

Keyword.Name: GetTimeByFormat
Keyword.Description: Get time by format and write time to buffer by input key name

Param.Name: sFormat
Param.Description: Format string

Param.Name: sBufferName
Param.Description: Buffer key name

Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: New Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable, NewCombineVariable is only different number of parameter with the old one

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine, range input: 2 --> 17

Param.Description: Variable 1

Param.Description: Variable 2

Param.Description: Variable 3

Param.Description: Variable 8

Param.Description: Variable 10

Keyword.Name: CheckExportedInfo
Keyword.Description: Check exported info in Bank Exports

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method side to check: ACH or Positive Pay, required

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to check, required

Param.Name: sYear
Param.Description: Year need to check, current means current Year, required

Param.Name: sMonth
Param.Description: Month need to check, current means current Month, required

Param.Name: sFileName
Param.Description: File Name need to check, can input with regex format

Param.Name: sFilter
Param.Description: Do filter after click to expand file name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to check and(/or) Processed date of Batch

Param.Name: sPaymentInfo
Param.Description: Meta of Payments need to check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: COUNTFILE(strVariable) to count total file of month and write to buffer strVariable; VERIFYTOTALFILE(number) to verify total file of month equal [number] provided

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to AP outsource web page

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Keyword.Name: GoToPayments
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: CopyAllFileToFolder
Keyword.Description: Copy all file to destination folder in sequence (eg.: for ACOM Uploading)

Param.Name: sSrcFolder
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sDestFolder
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sDelay
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Keyword.Name: GetTimeByFormat
Keyword.Description: Get time by format and write time to buffer by input key name

Param.Name: sFormat
Param.Description: Format string

Param.Name: sBufferName
Param.Description: Buffer key name

Param.Name: sDate
Param.Description: path to Source File need to upload

Param.Name: sNumOfDays
Param.Description: path to Destination on sFTP server

Param.Name: sWorkingDate
Param.Description: Copy file in sequence with delay time

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sFile
Param.Description: file path, not null, lastfile()

Param.Name: sLine
Param.Description: line number, not null

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: VerifyExsitingInBankExport
Keyword.Description: Verify in page Bank Export, View Type Error, Bank Account, Total Bank Account Amount, use this keyword after keyword VerifySingleBatchProcessNotification or VerifyGroupBatchProcessNotification with paramter "sClickOnCard = yes" and in case Batch Process Error (Images\Customer\Payment\VerifyExsitingInBankExport.png)

Param.Name: sSelectedTab
Param.Description: The name of current selected tab, can't be null

Param.Name: sSelectedView
Param.Description: Verify which is selected in View Type

Param.Name: sDisplayedBankAccount
Param.Description: Verify which is BankAccount in display in PostivePay area

Param.Name: sTotalPositivePayAmountOfBankAccount
Param.Description: Total Positive Bank Account Amount, null by pass verify

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to AP outsource web page

Param.Name: sUserName
Param.Description: User Name

Param.Name: sIsClick
Param.Description: Click Sign In

Keyword.Name: GoToPayments
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Name: sTime
Param.Description: Time to sleep - in second

Keyword.Name: CheckExportedInfo
Keyword.Description: Check exported info in Bank Exports

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method side to check: ACH or Positive Pay, required

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name need to check, required

Param.Name: sYear
Param.Description: Year need to check, current means current Year, required

Param.Name: sMonth
Param.Description: Month need to check, current means current Month, required

Param.Name: sFileName
Param.Description: File Name need to check, can input with regex format

Param.Name: sFilter
Param.Description: Do filter after click to expand file name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to check and(/or) Processed date of Batch

Param.Name: sPaymentInfo
Param.Description: Meta of Payments need to check

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: COUNTFILE(strVariable) to count total file of month and write to buffer strVariable; VERIFYTOTALFILE(number) to verify total file of month equal [number] provided

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Param.Name: sCSVFile

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches
Keyword.Description: Tab Batches - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword SelectDoActionOnABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\15.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches
Keyword.Description: Tab Batches - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword SelectDoActionOnABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\15.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches

Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches
Keyword.Description: Tab Batches - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword SelectDoActionOnABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\15.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches
Keyword.Description: Tab Batches - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword SelectDoActionOnABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\15.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Paper Check Status;Batch Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Description: Log out

Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Keyword.Param: Virtual Card is missing for Bank Account \"N_Bank_No VCARD\" and is required for processing VCard payments.

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: VerifyBatchProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Batch, must open Batch Properties popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword SelectDoActionOnABatch or DoActionOnFirstPaymentBatch with action Name: View Batch Properties (Images\Customer\Payment\8.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ;

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means empty - With Property Name is Date Format Type keyword will verify by contains not full string

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

TestCase.Name: VCARD payment is invalid, CHECKS (Positive Pay) payment is valid.
TestCase.Description: VCARD payment is invalid, CHECKS (Positive Pay) payment is valid.
TestCase.Author: Nho Nguyen

Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Keyword.Param: Virtual Card is missing for Bank Account \"N_Bank_No VCARD\" and is required for processing VCard payments.

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: EditABatch
Keyword.Description: Edit A Batch - This keyword is only support ADD/REMOVE one Payment (not multiple)(with REMOVE: can REMOVE ALL) (Images\Customer\Payment\12.png)

Param.Name: sNewBatchName
Param.Description: New Batch Name - null means not edit

Param.Name: sNewDescription
Param.Description: New Description - null means not edit

Param.Name: sRemovePayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - ALL means remove all payment from this Batch - Null means not do action remove

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action remove

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action need to do after Edit Batch - Discard - Save - Save and Process

Keyword.Name: VerifyBatchInfoInAllBatchesTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Verify Batch Information in All Batch - Tab Processed, use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountCard (Images\Customer\Payment\50.png)

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name in AllBatches need to verify

Param.Name: isExistACHDownload
Param.Description: Check this Batch is exist ACH Download Button or Not, yes|no|null, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: isExistPositivePayDownload
Param.Description: Check this Batch is exist Positive Pay Download Button or Not, yes|no|null, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sNumberOfPayment
Param.Description: Number of payment in this batch, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount of this Batch, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sBatchDate
Param.Description: Date of Batch, verify by content, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Keyword.Param: Virtual Card is missing for Bank Account \"N_Bank_No VCARD\" and is required for processing VCard payments.

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: SortPaymentBatches
Keyword.Description: Sort Payment Batches in Tab BATCHES on Payment Page (Images\Customer\Payment\6.png)

Param.Name: sField
Param.Description: Field name - Batch Name - Bank Account Name - Total Payments - Total Batch Amount - Batch Create Date

Param.Name: sSortType
Param.Description: Sort Type - Ascending(A-Z) - Descending(Z-A)

Keyword.Name: SelectDoActionOnABatch
Keyword.Description: Select and/or DoAction on A Batch based on its ordinal or Batch Name in Tab Batch on Payment File - This keyword is used after keyword SortPaymentBatch (Images\Customer\Payment\14.png)

Param.Name: sOrdinal
Param.Description: Ordinal of Batch Name in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch based on its ordinal

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name need to select in the List of Batch - keyword only support select first 30 Batches in the Batch List - null means by pass select Batch base on Batch Name - Find by contains not specific

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action Name - null means by pass do action on found Batch just select

Keyword.Name: EditABatch
Keyword.Description: Edit A Batch - This keyword is only support ADD/REMOVE one Payment (not multiple)(with REMOVE: can REMOVE ALL) (Images\Customer\Payment\12.png)

Param.Name: sNewBatchName
Param.Description: New Batch Name - null means not edit

Param.Name: sNewDescription
Param.Description: New Description - null means not edit

Param.Name: sRemovePayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - ALL means remove all payment from this Batch - Null means not do action remove

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - Null means not do action remove

Param.Name: sAction
Param.Description: Action need to do after Edit Batch - Discard - Save - Save and Process

Keyword.Name: VerifyBatchInfoInAllBatchesTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Verify Batch Information in All Batch - Tab Processed, use this keyword after keyword SelectABankAccountCard (Images\Customer\Payment\50.png)

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Batch Name in AllBatches need to verify

Param.Name: isExistACHDownload
Param.Description: Check this Batch is exist ACH Download Button or Not, yes|no|null, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: isExistPositivePayDownload
Param.Description: Check this Batch is exist Positive Pay Download Button or Not, yes|no|null, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sNumberOfPayment
Param.Description: Number of payment in this batch, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sTotalAmount
Param.Description: Total Amount of this Batch, null means by pass verify it

Param.Name: sBatchDate
Param.Description: Date of Batch, verify by content, null means by pass verify it

Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Batch Status;Positive Pay Export Status;Paper Check Status;ACH Export Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Description: Close browser

Param.Name: sCSVFile

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName

Param.Name: sCheckNoBatchFound
Param.Description: Check No Batch Found - yes: check - null: not check

Param.Name: sSearchText
Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Name: sSelectFirstResult
Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes: means click - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Batch Status;Positive Pay Export Status;ACH Export Status;Paper Check Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
Param.Description: Expected import status - Success|UnSuccess

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBatch
Keyword.Description: Create new Batch - Note that this keyword is just support add only one Payment to new Batch, to add more, please use keyword EditABatch (Images\Customer\Payment\39.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountCard
Keyword.Description: Select a Bank Account Card on Processed Page (Images\Customer\Payment\3.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Keyword.Name: FilterProcessedBatch
Keyword.Description: Filter Batch in tab Processed on Payment File (Images\Customer\Payment\2.png)

Param.Name: sCheckNoBatchFound
Param.Description: Check No Batch Found - yes: check - null: not check

Param.Name: sSearchText
Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Name: sSelectFirstResult
Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes: means click - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Batch Status;Positive Pay Export Status;Paper Check Status;ACH Export Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Keyword.Name: FilterProcessedBatch

Param.Name: sCheckNoBatchFound
Param.Description: Check No Batch Found - yes: check - null: not check

Param.Name: sSearchText
Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Name: sSelectFirstResult
Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes: means click - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Batch Status;Positive Pay Export Status;ACH Export Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sBatchName
Param.Description: Name of Batch need to create - null means default

Param.Name: sBatchDescription
Param.Description: Description of Batch - null means default

Param.Name: sAddPayment
Param.Description: Input with format [PaymentNumber;PayeeName] - All means add all payments - Null means not do action add

Param.Name: sActionName
Param.Description: Action after input all information - Null means save

Keyword.Name: ProcessPaymentBatch
Keyword.Description: Process Payment or Batch, must open Process Payment/Batch Popup before use this keyword, in normally, this keyword is use after keyword DoActionOnFirstBatch or SelectDoActionOnABatch with action Name: Process Batch or ClickProcessOnFirstPayment(Images\Customer\Payment\9.png)

Param.Name: sOverridePaymentDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Override Payment Date with Processing Date

Param.Name: sSendPaymentEmailNotifications
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Send Payment E-mail Notifications

Param.Name: sIncludeRemittanceDetails
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details

Param.Name: sACHEffectiveEntryDate
Param.Description: Check or Uncheck on checkbox Include Remittenace Details - Format MM/dd/yyyy - null means leave if by default value

Param.Name: sExpectedProcess
Param.Description: Success or Unsuccess

Param.Name: sDownloadFile
Param.Description: ACH means download ACH file, POSITIVEPAY means download Positive Pay file, ACHandPOSITIVEPAY means download ACH and Positive Pay, null means by pass download file

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ContinueProcessOtherPayment(yes) - Verify one of Payment of Batch can't process, value yes means continue proccess, cancel means cancel process batch, HangOn(done) means verity the dialog HangOn and click on Button Done)

Keyword.Name: SelectABankAccountCard

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Keyword.Name: FilterProcessedBatch
Keyword.Description: Filter Batch in tab Processed on Payment File (Images\Customer\Payment\2.png)

Param.Name: sCheckNoBatchFound
Param.Description: Check No Batch Found - yes: check - null: not check

Param.Name: sSearchText
Param.Description: Text need to input in the filter - Brett's Batch - null

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Batch found - null: means not check

Param.Name: sSelectFirstResult
Param.Description: Select first result or input number - yes: means click - null

Keyword.Name: VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabProcessed
Keyword.Description: Processed Tab - Verify (and DoAction) on a Payment is exist or not in a Batch based on Payment Number or Payee Name or Payment Amount or Payment Method, this keyword is used after keyword FilterProcessedBatch - Note: This keyword is similar with keyword VerifyDoActionPaymentInBatchTabBatches, different Tab (Images\Customer\Payment\18.png)

Param.Name: sPaymentNumber
Param.Description: Payment Number need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Number

Param.Name: sPayeeName
Param.Description: Payee Name need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payee Name

Param.Name: sPaymentAmount
Param.Description: Payment Amount need to verify - not contains $ - not contains comma - must contains dot (if any)|null means by pass filter by Payment Amount

Param.Name: sPaymentMethod
Param.Description: Payment Method need to verify - null means by pass filter by Payment Method

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: VerifyPaymentProperties
Keyword.Description: Verify Properties of a Payment, must open this side bar property page before (Images\Customer\Payment\26.png)

Param.Name: sPropertyName
Param.Description: Name of property need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - null means by pass verify, in case of you just need to use sOptional

Keyword.Param: Transaction Type;Status;Export Status;Batch Status;Positive Pay Export Status;ACH Export Status;Paper Check Status

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to check - separate by semi-colon ; - With Property Name Type is Date Format: keyword will verify by contains not full string - null means empty

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: Expected result true|false

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ClickLastCardActivity(true) - it will click on the link of Last Card Activity, ClickBatchID(true) - it will click on the link of Batch ID, DownloadFileName(true) - it will click on the link of FileName for downloading file

Param.Name: sNumberOfResult
Param.Description: Number of Payment after filter - null means by pass checking this

Param.Name: sActionNameOnFirstPayment
Param.Description: Do Action on first Payment found by filter above - null means by pass this action

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: OnlyOpenMenu(true) mean after click on Do More Icon, do nothing, next kw is: VerifyDoMoreActionMenu

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sCSVFile
Param.Description: CSV file need to import

Param.Name: sFileFormat
Param.Description: Payment Data Format File

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sBankAccount
Param.Description: Bank Account Name

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sExpectedImportResult
